title: [Medicine] ARTICLE: The rich are pouring millions into life extension research â€“ but does it have any ethical value

[Medicine] Review of neurological side effects of second-gen antidepressants: The least tolerated antidepressants on the neurological tract were desvenlafaxine and venlafaxine. Agomelatine, bupropion and vortioxetine showed reduced neurological SEs, diminished risk in insomnia, somnolence, blurred vision.
